documents.document: @TLC @MyUmami79 @TLCmeNow at least this was a great result, was very chuffed for them both as they had the right attitude
@MyUmami79 aww not quite result i was after, but you carried yourself well..Janice shouldve played things cool, hope you work it out though
@HaunSoloProject LOL good timing alright, we were just talking about him earlier :p (was okay @realjonlovitz it was good talk LOL)
@kristintbooth looks better than some of the supposed art we saw at the museum today LOL
@AlamedaDowning @kristintbooth @Eric_Mabius @geoffgustafson @RealCrystalLowe @MarthaMoonWater because im a day ahead can i watch 1st? :p
@didileard @jamienotis thats a prerequisite for that show isnt it? :p
@jasegunn @realDonaldTrump that is probably next.....he is mad you know...
@RossLTaylor thought Kane had lost it with some poor fielding placements...the bowling wasnt too great, but we'll take any win over them :p
good result there @BLACKCAPS, we'll take it...wins a win
@braydenwalker1 @lauramcgoldrick @scottbstyris @simon was thinking 330 might be....we shall see...but probably not, but great last over :)
@TimHipsley if its wonky for both sides then its not a problem...harden up...
@GeorgiaLove71 @radiosportnz is that @bawads ??? always a great commentary when he's around, the king :)
@SoCaliGirlO2 oh yeah im glad i live where i do, it doesnt stop us all being affected in some way though....we're on the same side here...
@BLACKCAPS last time you put building a partnership we lost 3 wickets....so just dont :p
@WisemanSara @realDonaldTrump @Avaaz i wouldnt have opened with Dear...theres nothing dear about the mongrel
@AdamBuzz last thing we need is you getting more clucky.....oh look seafood :p
@Andrew_Mulligan oh dear nevermind :p
@KarenDavid @onceabcofficial @Disneyland @OnceABC thats good casting, she could pass as your taller sister, but does she dance as well? :p
@AllOfMyHeartTV @IamLaceyChabert @brennan_elliott @hallmarkchannel looking pretty smooth there Brennan :) (and Lacey lovely as always :)
@SWTGallagher @cricinfo probably someone who isnt even aussie, like many of their successful musos/actors :p
@GenealogyPBS yep we all had them from somewhere to somewhere... the girls who left their families i find remarkable and brave...
@Dastmalchian i can see how you find it hard to tell the difference, they're the ones with the hate in their eyes and zero heart...
@CoryBooker good on you, ive been watching from afar and am so glad to see you manning up and not sitting idle, damn shame you even have to
@FretlessMonster those were some cool cats those pioneers..and Marvin, Sam Cooke....mucho awesomeness poured out of them too
rellie in Canada just had an adorable baby girl...good to see he kept up the family tradition of beautiful girls (us guys, not so pretty :p
@sonia_mafs im just glad she has found her thing she wants to do and that its something positive ...im pretty proud of her for that :)
@sonia_mafs i hope you dont mean the idea of marrying....im far from ready for that (besides shes too young) :p
@GenealogyPBS @PBS is there any word on a new series yet???
@HaunSoloProject good on you girl, give them nazis hell for me :)
lil miss starts her endeavour to become @sonia_mafs pt 2 not getting hitched to a stranger (no way), shes training to be a social worker :)
@SoCaliGirlO2 some are being handcuffed and asked what they think of him.....now he thinks hes king, is just a fucking mad dictator
@RealCrystalLowe i cant go near this without my coffee...too much thinking required......oh look, brews up.... :p
@Tom_MAFS @KortKneee_Rae good, just checking i didnt have to send either of you a cake with a chisel in it (i bake like he does taxes)
every good rocker needs a (mostly) darling daughter to mellow out with in their old(er) age...happiest of times are to come im sure
have got my best friend visiting for a few days (arrives tomorrow) then he heads home to find out what sex his baby is...i say a girl
@hallmarkmovie i cant think of any other reason to :p
@sumostevenson @Blitzboks and good sportsmanship/humility shown by the captain, well done...excellent to watch
@sumostevenson those people doing that are the morons who are only there to be seen to be at events, they wouldnt even know what rugby was
shades of Hitler right there definitely....my answer @realDonaldTrump is a fucking asshole at best... https://t.co/bPWLyODf8K
@MilesDavisLive yep, just as ugly and shitheaded in cartoon form...
@SoCaliGirlO2 like it really matters? that kind of thing should be left behind closed doors, cant stand anyone preaching to me
@Tom_MAFS @KortKneee_Rae i hope neither of you have got Trump to take care of those taxes for you :p
@vurnt22 seems for now at least one ballsy judge has stuck up for what is right...
@hallmarkmovie only that some of my ancestors left there in the 1700s :p
@sumostevenson i mean marketed as its own sport..its still great to watch :)
@sumostevenson there was a time when it was...
@kristintbooth @hallmarkmovie i for one (amongst many) look forward to the new fllm (and the following ones) :)
@bhmfan Obama is both white and african :) (im distantly related to his mum :), whereas Trump, fuck knows what planet he's from....
@LZZYHALE @1200WOAI good to see @DamonJOfficial rocking out too...is that Pete Willis' gatt? :)
@vurnt22 great that he lived to be remembered and that you have cared enough to do so...so kudos to you both
@BLACKCAPS @RossLTaylor fingers crossed for some more big ones for ya..a win or 2 would be good as well :)
@FirstDates @MerlinFDC4 that guy was hilarious, just what the batty old bird needed :)
if only more of you americans spoke such truth.... https://t.co/rasFRgswZ1
@KarenDavid as much as i dont like my birthday being lauded id be happy if a clone of yours danced for me like that anytime LOL #CuteAs
@MyUmami79 mum has a brother we're trying to find but our laws here are rubbish so its tough going,but love when others have great results
@MyUmami79 @TLC yes indeed, we watch all 3 versions of the show, and love them all..even an old badass like me gets a bit of a lump going :)
@TLC @MyUmami79 i hope we see plenty of those beautiful smiles this coming episode...will make sure i have a clean hanky too LOL #Prepared
@MyUmami79 @TLC @mslisajoyner @ChrisJacobs you'll be (hopefully) pleased to know ive told family in the US, UK and here in NZ to tune in :)
@moniquethestar couldnt give a damn as long as there is some bog roll LOL
@patvalley sir even? usually people calling me that want something, guess the same can be said for Benji type dogs? :)
@blairwilki2 @kristintbooth you are not wrong :)
@ClayneCrawford i have to agree...sorry but its true :)
@patvalley good morning reginald!
@RachelDeAlto i think im guilty of that being a permanent thing...it comes in handy when researching genealogy though :)
@kristintbooth good luck with the headache...and the kidlets :)
@dantebrown @LethalWeaponFOX @LethalWriters watched the ep last night, sorry you didnt get that trip to NZ (which is where i live) :)
@edovdkolk you seemed to have gotten the wrong memo, im pretty sure that was Elvis Presley, #ThereCanBeOnlyOne
@ChrisJacobs @mslisajoyner must say i love your empathy and sincerity in presenting #LongLostFamily, it must provide great comfort to all
@MyUmami79 @TLC @mslisajoyner @ChrisJacobs will indeed be watching, fantastic heartfelt episode this week, remarkably courageous mum/girls
@MyUmami79 @TLC @mslisajoyner @ChrisJacobs oh good that tells me one reunion went well...that makes me very pleased, congrats to all :)
@MyUmami79 @TLCmeNow @TLC just about to watch the 2nd episode of the What Happened Next....hopefully better outcomes this week? #Hopeful :)
@keeshasharp doing a beer run for @ClayneCrawford ? :)
@dantebrown @LethalWeaponFOX @LethalWriters still waiting to see this lineup of girlfriends of his as well :). loads of potentials there
@dancedeadly666 @keeshasharp @DamonkWayans i voted for you all for the Peoples Choice awards but none of my picks won anything...ripped off
@DamonkWayans @dantebrown @keeshasharp how long til he becomes a cop? just putting it out there, let's not tell Trish just yet :)
@LethalWeaponFOX what???? 2 weeks??? no no no none of this waiting nonsense...im calling @keeshasharp .....sort it girl.....
@DamonkWayans @keeshasharp i think there might be plenty enough Murtaughs to go around no? :p #WearABoxWednesdays
@keeshasharp @LethalWeaponFOX any news on that yet? it SHOULD be a certainty...or im blaming that screwup @realDonaldTrump for that too
@dantebrown @keeshasharp @LethalWeaponFOX @LethalWriters LOL write me in, i'd do a cameo for free LOL
@keeshasharp @dantebrown Mums are on a need to know basis :p...stay strong lad :)
@keeshasharp ive found some real shockers in my genealogy....who the hell calls their kid "Submit" ????
@keeshasharp gotta grab those zzz's when we can...hopefully not when you're talking with him but :p (avoid those daggers hubs :p
@xXgertieXx @LethalWeaponFOX @DamonkWayans @ClayneCrawford someone has to, us men can be pretty hopeless otherwise :p
@GabbieRaeRocks when will the album be out? ..dont do a @Real_Sykes on me here :p
@LethalWeaponFOX @DamonkWayans @keeshasharp had a pal like that when we were teens, always showed up for grub my sister called him Lunchbox
@keeshasharp @adeleBlim @MrGeneHong @LethalWriters probably for the best that idea she failed at that rhythm gymnastics then? :)
@BarbaraNiven @dailykos the facts of anything and everything would be good, i would've thought essential...but hey that's just me being real
@keeshasharp tomorrow for me, but seeing as im here i may as well laugh at yours and @DamonkWayans replies to people :) #ItdBeRudeNotTo
@avancenz can't say i blame her after the sexist pigs didn't give her the head sherangs job
@joshgwal definitely could pass as her son at least :)
@TheRue had the same thing for the last Die Hard film funnily enough....was brilliant :)
@DamonkWayans shades of @fotc #1 man Murray...."whos present?" :p
@LethalWeaponFOX @ClayneCrawford @JordanaBrewster i reckon the wife would want him to move on, @keeshasharp's friend wouldve been nice :)
@TeriWilsonauthr i think @cindy_busby wanted a rather exotic kiwi guy in the sequel.... its either me or @russellcrowe (im cheaper :p
@TeriWilsonauthr @cindy_busby cupcakes dont tend to last long around me, certainly not long enough for me to wing any your way :p
@cindy_busby @awonderfulmovie @hallmarkchannel @TeriWilsonauthr @RyanPaevey i'm on Teri's case, if i have to throw ideas in i will LOL :)
@ange49nz at least they are on...phew....
@awonderfulmovie @hallmarkchannel @TeriWilsonauthr @cindy_busby @RyanPaevey ....now about that sequel folks??? :)
@c_rollyson pleased to read it, you were all very endearing so its not hard to care :)
@Eric_Mabius sounds just like home at the moment...and this is meant to be summer ? :)
